2008950.name: Russian Soldier Simulator
2008950.description:
This unique experience allows the player to see the perspective of the Russian soldier. Providing an overview of the military history of the largest country in the world, Russian Soldier Simulator includes references to the following conflicts:

  • Finland 1918
  • Poland 1920
  • Afghanistan 1979
  • Chechnya 1994

Each new playthrough immediately ends with the display of the death screen, which will contain the circumstances of the demise and some brilliant quotes. Discover all the variants of these descriptions to unlock new achievements.

As an anti-war and pacifist project, RSS is a free game. The developer, however, would like to encourage players to make donations to peaceful organizations supporting aid for Ukraine.
